condition.title: Problem
condition.p: A warning appears during the PDF transformation that is similar to this:[CH] Glyph "?" (0x2192, arrowright) not available in font "Roboto-Bold".Even if the message is a warning, sometimes it can lead to a failed transformation. This usually occurs for unique special characters (different from letters or common characters).

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Some fonts lack specific characters, such as CJK characters or Greek symbols commonly used in scientific publications. Those characters are replaced with the # symbol in the PDF output.
